name: RAG (spacedassie, Nebbia)
description:
--REQUIRES 2 to 4 CONTROLLERS FOR INPUT--

RAG is a couch party game where the goal is to survive for as long as possible.

Avoid falling platforms and punch your enemies into the water.

R2 for attack and R1 for dash

L2 to bring up shield

X to Jump

Left stick for movement and Right stick for Aiming.

--

This game was made by Christiaan de Jager, Dylan Fairhurst and Ruben van der Merwe as a Second year project.
